Question: AAWireless CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AAWireless

Product: AAWireless 2

- Sleeker and more compact design
- Features a smaller footprint and curved sides
- USB-C port for flexible placement
- Addition of a physical multifunction button
- Minimal changes under the hood with a different processor
- AAWireless app enables features
- Supports CarPlay in beta alongside Android Auto
- Anticipated release later this year
- Existing model available for $69.99 and will continue to receive updates
Summary_cn:
AAWireless

产品：AAWireless 2

- 更时尚、更紧凑的设计
- 特点是占用空间更小、边角更圆润
- 增加了一个可灵活放置的USB-C端口
- 加入了一个物理多功能按钮
- 在内部进行了一些微小的更改，采用了不同的处理器
- AAWireless应用程序启用了一些功能
- 支持Beta版的CarPlay和Android Auto
- 预计在今年晚些时候发布
- 现有型号售价为69.99美元，并将继续获得更新
